item.title: HMY
item.description: score:-19 Chances: Investors seeking less volatility within their portfolio may gravitate towards materials stocks focusing on gold mining or other precious metals. Gold prices have surged recently and are trading at near all-time highs. In any market environment, gold and other precious metals stocks are always a solid addition to any investment portfolio as they allow investors to diversify and gain exposure to a number of financial markets.
